resources.string:
The rules for this blackjack game is as follows: 

 - You start with 1000 money and if you get 0 you lose the game. 
 - You start the game by checking the box which contains the amount of money you want to bet. 
 - Dealer draws on 16 and stays on 17. 
 - If you get 21 for your first hand and dealer does not you win 2.5 your money.
 - If you tie with dealer you keep your bet. 
 - You can split your cards for double your bet and are able to split only one time when the value of your first two cards are the same. 
 - If you have 9, 10 or 11 with two cards you are able to double down your bet. This can be done either normally or after splitting.
